description: The `Output Generation & Job Management` subsystem is crucial for user interaction, job execution, and transforming analysis results into consumable documentation. It acts as the bridge between the core analysis engine and the end-user, managing the entire lifecycle of documentation generation.

components.name: Job Orchestration & CLI Interface
components.description: This component serves as the primary interface for users, parsing command-line arguments, validating inputs, and coordinating the overall workflow for analysis and documentation generation jobs. It initiates job execution and manages the decision-making process for handling local or remote repositories.

components.name: Job Lifecycle & Data Management
components.description: This component is responsible for managing the complete lifecycle of analysis and documentation generation jobs, including their creation, fetching, updating, and persistent storage. It also handles the management and cleanup of temporary code repository folders required for analysis.

components.name: Output Generation Engine
components.description: This component transforms processed analysis data into various documentation formats, such as HTML, Markdown, MDX, and Sphinx RST. It handles the specific formatting, structuring, and rendering required for each output type to produce the final documentation.

components_relations.relation: initiates job creation and updates by interacting with
provides job status and stored data back to
